value.title: How do you conditionally highlight a bar in a Power BI Report?
value.excerpt: There are different interactions Power BI visuals can have, but how do we conditionally highlight a bar in a Power BI report using a slicer? Patrick shows you some MAGIC to get this to work.  Question from Live Stream: https://youtu.be/hS4hZdNZ8vw?t=1009  Phil Seamark's Blog: https://dax.tips/  Edit

value.title: Make your Power BI report POP with a custom background
value.excerpt: Is your report plain or bland? Patrick shows you how you can easily make your Power BI report pop with a custom background. It's as easy as just getting PowerPoint and drawing some shapes.  Demo files: https://guyinacu.be/demofiles  ******** LET'S CONNECT! ********  -- http://twitter.com/guyinacube --

value.title: Modern Data Lakehouse? Where do you even start??? Azure Synapse of course!

Patrick and Stijn help you get a handle on it with Azure Synapse Analytics!  Stijn Wynants https://twitter.com/SQLStijn  Building a Modern Lakehouse Data Warehouse with Azure Synapse Analytics:

value.title: Overview of Power BI Workspaces
value.excerpt: Adam gives you an overview of Power BI Workspaces. This includes the My Workspace and App Workspaces within Power BI. This focuses on the new workspace experience.  Organize work in the new workspaces (preview) in Power BI https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/service-new-workspaces  Create the new workspaces

value.title: Power BI report page tooltip - How to create one in Power BI Desktop
value.excerpt: Patrick walks through what a Power BI report page tooltip is and how to create one in Power BI Desktop. This is a feature that was added to Power BI Desktop in the March 2018 release.  LET'S CONNECT!  Guy in a Cube -- https://guyinacube.com -- http://twitter.com/guyinacube -- http://www.facebook.com/guyinacube

value.title: Power BI Tutorial: Dynamically Filter By Today's Date
value.excerpt: In this Power BI Tutorial, Patrick looks at how to dynamically filter by today's date. Using a date table, you can create a DAX measure that can then be used as a Power BI report-level filter to dynamically filter by today's date within Power BI Desktop.be  LET'S CONNECT!  Guy in a Cube -- https://guyinacube.com

value.title: Power BI Walkthrough: Analysis Services Live Connect
value.excerpt: Adam walks through how to setup a live connection to Analysis Services, or Azure Analysis Services, in Power BI Desktop. This also involves getting things working with the On-Premises Data Gateway.  What is a gateway - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WJ5Y4FjkWZw Authentication with AS Live Connections

value.title: Revisiting a Power BI solution with Dynamic M Parameters

value.title: Using Power BI reports from an end user perspective (2021)
value.excerpt: Just an end user of Power BI? Consuming reports and not authoring at all? Adam walks through how to navigate and use Power BI reports. value.title: What is a Common Table Expression (CTE) and how do you use them?
value.excerpt: We've had some questions about what a Common Table Expression (CTE) is. Patrick describes what they are and how you can use them in SQL Server or Azure Synapse Analytics.  WITH common_table_expression (Transact-SQL) https://learn.microsoft.com/sql/t-sql/queries/with-common-table-expression-transact-sql?view=sql-server-ver16

value.title: Why can't I use Microsoft Fabric?
value.excerpt: You've heard about all the great things with Microsoft Fabric, but you don't see it in the portal. You only see the Power BI items and no persona switcher. What's going on? Adam shows you to enable Fabric for your tenant.  Enable Microsoft Fabric for your organization https://learn.microsoft.com/fabric/admin/fabric-switch

value.title: Export the Data of a Power BI table entirely in a few Clicks
value.excerpt: If you want to export the data of a Power BI table, you have options such as copy and paste, or putting it in a visual and export it. However, there is an easier way available too. You can use Power BI Helper (free tool) to export the entire data of the table. The instruction below explains how it is

value.title: Generate Year and Month Combinations in Power BI Report using DAX
value.excerpt: A common requirement when reporting data with a Date axis is to be able to see the year and the month in a short form beside each other. Formats such as 2021 Jan, or Jan 2021, or even Jan 21, or 2021-01 are very popular. In Power BI, ideally, you should have a Date dimension with columns for this. However,

value.title: Connect and analyze your Dynamics 365 data​
value.excerpt: Connect and analyze your Dynamics 365 Data​

value.title: Introduction to end-to-end analytics using Microsoft Fabric
value.excerpt: Discover how Microsoft Fabric can meet your enterprise's analytics needs in one platform. Discover the capabilities Fabric has to offer, understand how it works, and identify how you can use Fabric for your analytics needs.

value.title: Perform analytics in Power BI
value.excerpt: You will learn how to use Power BI to perform data analytical functions, how to identify outliers in your data, how to group data together, and how to bin data for analysis. You will also learn how to perform time series analysis. Finally, you will work with advanced analytic features of Power BI, such as Quick Insights, AI Insights, and the Analyze feature.

value.title: Enhance Power BI report designs for the user experience
value.excerpt: Enhance Power BI report designs for the user experience

value.title: Work with Delta Lake tables in Microsoft Fabric
value.excerpt: Tables in a Microsoft Fabric lakehouse are based on the Delta Lake technology commonly used in Apache Spark. By using the enhanced capabilities of delta tables, you can create advanced analytics solutions.
